channel.title: Liar - ■■■■ - Canned
channel.description:
#### [color=brown]LIARS[/color]
<small>[u]Rules[/u] 1. <small>Obey all general Forum rules. 2. <small>[color=brown]**THE KNIFE**[/color] sees all, and does not approve of [color=red]**LIES**[/color]. Do not lie, lest you risk its' judgement. 3. <small>[color=purple]**THE SPEAR**[/color] hears all [color=purple]**WISHES**[/color] spoken in [color=purple]**ITS' DYE**[/color]. 4. <small>This game is a game of Mafia. There will be an informed minority and an uninformed majority. You will know which you are when you receive your rolecard. 5. <small>The moderator will never lie to you on your rolecard, but may lie in your night results. 6. <small>Only the [color=red]**FORSWORN**[/color] may lie. 1. <small>Days will be 48 hours. Nights will be 24 hours. Unless otherwise stated. 2. <small>Majority is disabled. Plurality is enabled. In the case of a tie, the player who recieved more votes first is ■■■■■. 3. <small>Do not communicate with the mods in the thread. Instead, **Pray** to the mods. Angleshooting role cards, mod PMs, communicating illicitly, and otherwise will result in being casted unto the ■■■■. 5. <small>Credits for inspiration and original setup goes to [color=gold]**MANTICHORA**[/color].
<small>[u]Victims[/u]
1. <small> WazzaAzza 3. <small> SogMan 4. <small> Andrej 5. <small> Marshal 6. <small> htm 13. <small> DatBird
<small>[u]Lost Souls[/u] - <small> NinjaPenguin
<small>[color=brown]**THE KNIFE TWITCHES**[/color]

item.title: Liar - ■■■■ - Canned
item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
Pardon?

We agreed that flipless would be better for this setup, but not for this forums.

You went flipless afterwards.

Read full topic

item.title: Liar - ■■■■ - Canned
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
On another topic

You are FORSWORN
You are part of ■■■■■

Corrupted Soul - THE KNIFE is bound to your soul. You start the game with it in your possession.

THE KNIFE OF LIES

The Truth Of The Knife - All true public statements about THE KNIFE are considered to be lies. All false public statements about THE KNIFE are considered to be true.
Corrupted Steel - Whenever THE KNIFE sees a public lie, it will React to indicate that it has Recognised the lie. THE KNIFE is colourblind.
Corrupted Slash - Each night, you may target a player whoose lies have been Recognised . What happens to them depends on amount of lies they said.
Corrupted Light - When you die, you will not flip, and you will be instead Sealed to spend eternity with THE KNIFE

You win the game when all threats to ■■■■■ are eliminated.

It was this ^^^^

Everyone was saying forsworned was scum and I wasn’t sure what the squares meant so

Read full topic

item.title: Liar - ■■■■ - Canned
item.dc:creator: sulit
item.description:
It stands for In Thread Attacks

Sometimes during a game a mod will allow ITAS.

Usually they provide a command to use like /stab (player)

These kills usually have a percent chance of happening

So like a mod could be like

“Type the command /stab (player to have a 15% chance of killing them or something

Read full topic
